doc.title: Win 2 Tickets to Attend a Gourmet Culinary Course!
doc.text: Do/VBP you/PRP have/VB a/DT hidden/JJ Gourmet/NN Chef/NN inside/NN of/IN you/PRP just/RB waiting/VBG to/TO be/VB awakened/RB ?/. Well/RB this/DT could/MD be/VB your/PRP$ opportunity/NN !/. The/DT Gourmet/NN Kitchen/NN is/VBZ offering/NN two/CD places/NNS for/IN our/PRP$ readers/NNS to/TO attend/VB their/PRP$ introduction/NN to/TO Gourmet/VB Cooking/JJ course/NN which/WDT will/VB feature/NN foundation/NN skills/NN in/IN Gourmet/NNP Cooking/NNP ./. So/CC you/PRP get/VB to/TO learn/VB stuff/NN like/IN basic/JJ knife/NN techniques/NN ,/, how/RB to/TO prepare/VB basic/JJ soups/NN and/CC sauces/NNS etc./RB ./. Great/JJ for/IN budding/NN chefs/NN ./. This/DT special/JJ course/NN is/VBZ normally/RB worth/JJ $/$ 100/CD per/NN head/NN but/CC the/DT lucky/JJ 2/CD readers/NNS will/VB get/VB to/TO attend/VB it/PRP free/JJ of/IN charge/NN but/CC not/RB totally/RB free/JJ ./. Attendees/PRP will/MD need/VB to/TO write/VB a/DT short/RB review/VB of/IN the/DT course/NN and/CC post/VB it/PRP on/IN the/DT blog/NN ./. The/DT course/NN is/VBZ being/NN held/VBD on/IN the/DT 24th/NN Aug/NN ,/, Fri/NNP -LRB-/NNP 6pm/NNP -/: 9pm/NNP -RRB-/NNP and/CC the/DT 25th/JJ Aug/NN ,/, Sat/NNP -LRB-/NNP 2pm/NNP -/: 7pm/NNP -RRB-/NNP at/IN 19/CD Lewis/NNP Road/NNP in/IN Bukit/NNP Timah/NNP ./. In/IN order/NN to/IN win/NN the/DT 2/CD tickets/NNS ,/, please/RB write/VB in/IN to/TO me/PRP at/IN leslie.tay@gmail.com/NN and/CC in/IN less/JJ than/IN 100/CD words/NNS let/VB me/PRP know/VB why/WRB you/PRP and/CC your/PRP$ friend/NN deserve/NN to/TO go/VB for/IN the/DT Culinary/JJ Skills/NN Course/NN ./. Please/PRP leave/VB your/PRP$ contact/NN number/NN as/IN well/RB ./. To/RB be/VB fair/JJ to/TO the/DT others/JJ ,/, once/RB you/PRP have/VBP won/VBN the/DT tickets/NN please/NN ensure/VB that/WDT you/PRP will/VB attend/VB the/DT course/NN ./. Please/DT note/NN that/IN this/DT is/VBZ a/DT special/JJ 2/CD day/NN course/NN but/CC they/PRP will/VB cover/VB 80/CD %/: of/IN the/DT 3/CD day/NN course/NN ./.
